page.title: 16Social Life
page.content: {Auchterhouse}is a happy community where people are willing to help each other. There is very little unemployment, with most people commuting to{Dundee}to work. There is a good social atmosphere. The{ {Community Council}organises a{Sports {Day}each June when the highlight is the race from the park to the top of the hill and back again, a gruelling race in which children of six years to adults over fifty years compete. Four years ago{Mr. G.Stewart}formed a {Pipe Band}for young people. He has trained a very successful group of twenty young pipers and drummers who play at functions all over{Tayside.} Each year they hold a{fund-raising {Barn Dance}at{Scotston Farm}which is attended by over five hundred people. This popular yearly event is supported by people from far and wide.
